SqlConfig.Content: select --手术病人信息 ss.PatientCode, --病人编号 ss.MedicalRecordCode, --病案号 ss.OperationRoom, --手术室 ss.OperationDepartment,--科室 ss.OperationDate, --手术时间 ss.OperationOrderCode, --手术台次 ss.OperationDoctor, --手术医生 ss.OperationName, --手术名称 ss.HandWashingNurse1, --洗手护士1 ss.HandWashingNurse2, --洗手护士2 ss.ItinerateNurse1, --巡回护士1 ss.ItinerateNurse2, --巡回护士2 ss.OperationStatus, --手术状态 ss.OperationBegin, --手术开始时间 ss.OperationEnd, --手术结束时间 ss.InRoomTime, --入手术室时间 ss.OutRoomTime --出手术室时间 from gys.operation_master_gys ss where PatientCode='{0}'

Contents.Content:
select --病人基本信息 br.PatientCode as VALUE,--病人编号 br.PatientCode as INPATIENTCODE,--病人编号 br.PatientName as NAME, --病人姓名 br.PatientName as DISPLAYNAME, --病人姓名 br.PatientSex as PATIENTSEX, --病人性别 br.PatientBirthday as PatientBirthday, --出生年月
--住院信息 zy.InPatientCode as SocialSecurityCard, --住院号 zy.WardArea as WARDAREA,--病区 zy.BedNumber as BEDNO, --床位 zy.BedNurse as BEDNURSE --床位护士 from surg_make.v_patient_info_gys br left join surg_make.pats_in_hospital_gys zy on br.PatientCode=zy.PatientCode where 1=1 {0}

select --手术信息 br.PatientCode as VALUE,--病人编号 br.PatientName as NAME, --病人姓名 br.PatientName as DISPLAYNAME, --病人姓名 br.PatientSex as PATIENTSEX, --病人性别 br.PatientBirthday as PatientBirthday, --出生年月
ss.MedicalRecordCode as MEDICALRECORDCODE, --病案号 ss.OperationRoom as OPERATIONROOM, --手术室 ss.OperationDepartment as OPERATIONDEPARTMENT, --科室 ss.OperationDate as OPERATIONDATE, --手术时间 ss.OperationDoctor as OPERATIONDOCTOR, --手术医生 ss.OperationName as OPERATIONNAME --手术名称 from surg_make.v_patient_info_gys br left join gys.operation_master_gys ss on br.PatientCode=ss.PatientCode where 1=1 {0}

select br.PatientCode, --病人编号 br.PatientName, --病人姓名 br.PatientSex, --病人性别 br.PatientBirthday, --出生日期
br.PatientIDCard, --身份证号 br.PatientAddress, --地址 br.PatientPhone, --联系电话 br.HighRiskInfectivity, --高危传染
gh.PatientCode, --病人ID gh.RegisterCode, --挂号系统编号 gh.RegisterDateTime, --挂号时间 gh.RegisterDepartment, --挂号科室 gh.RegisterNumber --挂号号 from surg_make.v_patient_info_gys br left join surg_make.clinic_master_gys gh on br.PatientCode=gh.PatientCode where 1=1 {0} order by RegisterDateTime Desc

select --病人基本信息 br.PatientCode as VALUE,--病人编号 br.PatientName as NAME, --病人姓名 br.PatientName as DISPLAYNAME, --病人姓名 br.PatientSex as PATIENTSEX, --病人性别 br.PatientBirthday as PatientBirthday, --出生年月
gh.RegisterCode as REGISTERCODE, --挂号系统编号 gh.RegisterDateTime as REGISTERDATETIME, --挂号时间 gh.RegisterNumber as REGISTERNUMBER, --挂号序号 gh.RegisterDepartment as REGISTERDEPARTMENT --挂号科室 from surg_make.v_patient_info_gys br left join surg_make.clinic_master_gys gh on br.PatientCode=gh.PatientCode where 1=1 {0} order by RegisterDateTime Desc
